summary: A black comedy set in 1979, about a soldier mistakenly posted to an Arctic military base.
cast: Jason Biggs|Natascha McElhone|Jeremy Northam|Sean Tucker|Hilmir Snær Guðnason|Harry Standjofski|Rob deLeeuw|Donny Falsetti|Jonathan Higgins|Michael Ironside|Benz Antoine|Mariah Inger|Dino Tosques|Einar Sigurðsson|Nelson Balderrama|Árni Thórarinsson|Kolbrún Ivarsdóttir|Buck Deachman|Carole Taylor|Genevieve Smoke|Crystal Wolker|Mario Courtemanche|Agostino Di Falco
title: Guy X
